channel.title: [PI] Need Help Changing Home [PI]
channel.description: Hey, I am using a Hybrid PvP Source and was wondering how to change the home to it. Please make a tutorial on how to change please. Thanks!

item.title: [PI] Need Help Changing Home [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Just go ingame, click the teleport home
then type ::mypos
you will get something like
X: 2124
Y: 2412

then go into the files such as clicking buttons and search the X axis

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need Help Changing Home [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“JokesOnYou, post:10, topic:412476”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=513736.msg3730532#msg3730532 date=1314587331]

[quote author=dark0259 link=topic=513736.msg3730467#msg3730467 date=1314584228]
The guy above is completely wrong. Just go to server -> config.java and look for the home spawn x and y variables. Then just change them.

Rep.
[/quote]Actually this just sets the home teleport, respawning and starter location… If you want to actually form a new home go to:
Config.java to set the above
ClickingButtons.java to set the home teleport if it dosent work with Config.java
Spawn-Config.cfg to set the NPC’s for shops, etc.
ObjectManager.java to set the objects
[/quote]Or do one simple that, Tut section -.-[/quote]Most of the tutorials that show these don’t even provide correct information…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need Help Changing Home [PI]
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

The easiest way i find to change coords of stuff.
Is just search your whole server files for the coords. of whatever you want.
It’s really too easy

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need Help Changing Home [PI]
item.dc:creator: @dark0259 dark0259
item.description:
@dark0259 wrote:

The guy above is completely wrong. Just go to server -> config.java and look for the home spawn x and y variables. Then just change them.

Rep.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need Help Changing Home [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

If you’re changing your home, you need to go into practicly every file, look for everything at you home, get the coords you want to move them too, change your teleports and all that, and make sure you have everything together before you all noobtube it out and start missing shit. But I wish you luck in changing your home. >.>

Files you should be editing.

Spawn-config
clickingmost[Maybe]
actionbutton[or something like that]
And a few more. Good luck.

~Demon

Read full topic
